title: Why did I get a free champion?
body: I joined and got a freeee champion! And summoner icon! WHAT CHAMPION DID U GET

replies.body: Why get kayle tho? 450ip... D: The skin is the only yummy bit. And the icon.
Um... it's on the main thing when you open up your client lol...
lmao you get kayle and riot kayle skin if u r above lvl 5 and had a game in the past few months 10 year anniversary <3
Nothing yet >__> just the icon so far
It's 10 year anniversary gift. There are pages on it on the League website.
